post.body: ... y si, me encanta la ciudad.

mais oui.
Uh, okay, I geddit. You have breasts. Now what?
it's 1st January 2009 and you've just made my day.
Only kidding of course: blonde or brunette you give good tweet.
I'm tempted to point out that "cheapening" implies that there is something to be lost. But it's mean, so I won't. ;>
The answer is in the signal to noise ratio not astrophysics.

"I am a hole surrounded by something."
